subject: Basketball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Hornets, the Suns and the Timberwolves say a three-team deal has been completed that will send the 7-foot center Robin Lopez and forward Hakim Warrick from Phoenix to New Orleans, while moving forward Wesley Johnson and a first-round draft pick from Minnesota to the Suns.
snippet: The Hornets, the Suns and the Timberwolves say a three-team deal has been completed that will send the 7-foot center Robin Lopez and forward Hakim Warrick from Phoenix to New Orleans, while moving forward Wesley Johnson and a first-round draft pick...
